venue.name: Not Your Average Joe's Restaurant Station Landing Medford, MA

item.description:
"We'll be in the private section by the front. Just mention to the wait staff you're with our group."

There is no charge for this meetup, however it is suggested that you get a drink or something there.
Also, if you send a dollar and mention "the Kitty Whist Players" to defray Liv and David's expense running the Games site, it would be appreciated.

Here's another opportunity to make some friends and eat good food at Not Your Average Joe's in Medford.

This location is easily accessible from Rt. 16, Rt. 28 and Rt. 93, and is walking distance from the Wellington Orange Line subway stop, near the new Station Landing apartment complex. There is free parking in the garage underneath the restaurant, and free parking all around the building.

Directions from Salem.
http://maps.google.co...

Joe Andrews is a tournament organizer and author of several card game books, including The Complete Win at Hearts and The Complete Win at Spades. He will be bringing copies of his books and joining us at the table for a couple card games!
item.how_to_find_us: I will be the one with the decks of cards.

group.name: The Salem Board Games Meetup Group

item.name: Whist, Hearts, Spades on Game night in Medford
